sentences.en: And skipping meals tends to make you overeat later.
sentences.cn: 不吃饭会让你有暴食的倾向.

sentences.en: And sweet and creamy fruits make us feel good inside, so we may overeat.
sentences.cn: 香甜爽滑的水果能让我们心情愉快, 所以,我们很容易吃得过多而不察觉.

sentences.en: Blair: Same here. You tend overeat in buffets, and it is a problem.
sentences.cn: 布莱尔: 我也吃不下了. 这就是自助餐的问题啊,总是吃太多.

sentences.en: Generally , you shouldn't overeat yourself before sleeping.
sentences.cn: 一般说来睡觉之前你不能吃得过饱.

sentences.en: He as advise not to overeat.
sentences.cn: 有人劝他不要吃得太多.

sentences.en: If you continue to overeat, you might be just like Michael Hebrank.
sentences.cn: 如果你们继续暴饮暴食, 可能就会变得和麦可?赫布兰克一样.

sentences.en: If you eat mindlessly, you will most likely overeat.
sentences.cn: 你要是盲目地吃, 很可能会吃得过多.

sentences.en: If you tend to overeat because of depression, first take steps to recognize the source of your sadness.
sentences.cn: 如果你常常因为沮丧而暴饮暴食，首先应该设法找到悲伤的原因。

sentences.en: Just as technology allows people to overeat, it now lets them overcommunicate.
sentences.cn: 就如同科技能使人们吃得过多, 它现在又造成人们之间联络过多.

sentences.en: People usually gain weight because they overeat, but what makes them overeat?
sentences.cn: 人们体重经常是因为吃得过饱而增长.可是为什么会吃过饱 呢 ?

sentences.en: Some children refuse to eat at all and others overeat.
sentences.cn: 有些孩子根本不吃饭，另外的一些孩子却吃得过量。

sentences.en: This means that they overeat at every meal and eventually this leads to obesity.
sentences.cn: 这就意味着它们每餐都会吃得更多一些,最终导致肥胖.

sentences.en: You need't go on a diet, but you must eat sensily and mustn't overeat.
sentences.cn: 你不必节食, 但必须饮食有度,不能吃得过饱.

sentences.en: You want longevity and overeat, you want friendship and exploit.
sentences.cn: 你想要长生不老却暴饮暴食, 你想关系友好却又剥削他人.

sentences.en: You will tend to overeat this week.
sentences.cn: 本周可能会吃的很多哦.

words.tran_cn: 穿得过分讲究；穿得过多
过度装饰；使穿著过分讲究

trans.tran_en: to eat too much, or eat more than is healthy
